title: Social: Contact Info (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Contact Info subcategory within Social. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.english: Please give me your email address.
cards.japanese: メールアドレスを教えてください。

cards.english: Please give me your cell phone email address.
cards.romaji: Keitai no meado wo oshiete kudasai.
cards.japanese: 携帯のメアドを教えてください。
私のメールアドレスです。
